Member Function Documentation

void Decal::add ( const Vector3 &  start,
const Vector3 &  end,
float  size,
int  type 
)

This function attempts to add a decal to the scene, given a world ray.

If the world ray collides with scene geometry, a decal is placed over the intersecting region. Try not to have too large an extent for the decal collision ray, for reasons of performance.

Parameters:
start The start of the collision ray.
end The end of the collision ray.
size The size of the resultant decal.
type The index of the decal texture.
See also:
BigWorld.decalTextureIndex

void Decal::addTriangles ( const WorldTriangle *  triangles,
int  numTriangles,
const Matrix &  transform,
int  type 
)

This function attempts to add a decal to the scene, given its final tesselated triangle composition.

Parameters:
triangles pointer to array of world triangles the compose the decal.
numTriangles number of triangles in the array.
transform The UV transform to be used when setting up the tex coords.
type The index of the decal texture.
See also:
BigWorld.decalTextureIndex

Clear decal object, setting decal vertices to zero.
